channel.title: Comments on: A New Adventure: Tech On Tap
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Brandon Leach
item.dc:creator: Brandon Leach
item.description: Seriously awesome idea. Next time I pass through WI i'm going to check to see if you have one of these planned.
item.content:encoded: Seriously awesome idea. Next time I pass through WI i’m going to check to see if you have one of these planned.

item.title: By: genomon
item.dc:creator: genomon
item.description: You really did it this time. This is the coolest thing in the world. Ever. WTG!
item.content:encoded: You really did it this time. This is the coolest thing in the world. Ever. WTG!

item.title: By: Andrew Neuman
item.dc:creator: Andrew Neuman
item.description: Great idea! I may have to plan a trip back to WI around this.
item.content:encoded: Great idea! I may have to plan a trip back to WI around this.

item.title: By: Pat Wright
item.dc:creator: Pat Wright
item.description: Sounds like a great idea! Hope it takes off and we see them all over the place great job!
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a great idea! Hope it takes off and we see them all over the place great job!

item.title: By: Brent Ozar
item.dc:creator: Brent Ozar
item.description: Congrats on starting the event! Sounds like fun.
item.content:encoded: Congrats on starting the event! Sounds like fun.
